level.heading: Conflicting laws and regulations repealed.
level.text: All laws or parts of laws and regulations promulgated thereunder in conflict with the provisions of this part shall be, and the same are hereby, repealed.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 enacted into law Part D of subchapter IV of Chapter 28 of Title 47.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 47-2886.01.
